name: Musidog
description:
Short dodge game made for t0e jam in 3 days. Instructions:

- [ARROW] keys or [WASD] to move the dog
- Collect as many bones and chests as you can and avoid fireballs!
- Grass makes you slow
- IMPORTANT: YOU CAN ONLY MOVE WHEN THE HEART SIGN IS ON

Code and art by me (palette is pico-8), music is "land of confusion" 8 bit jazz version.
